thread.title: ANITA
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by ANITA

author: ANITA
title: ANITA
text: We bought a bonded leather couch from Home Zone and after 4 years, it started to peel, and had some mechanical problems. I contacted them and they offered to let me "reselect" another couch because we had bought a warranty. I had trouble finding my receipt and they even helped me with that. We were shocked that we were able to get a new couch for the same price. But GET the WARRANTY ! Very thankful to Home Zone ! They were very helpful..
